title: Alphabet meets earnings expectations but misses on YouTube ad revenue
content: Google parent company Alphabet reported earnings after the bell.
summary: Google parent company Alphabet reported earnings after the bell.

title: Tesla reports disappointing earnings for second quarter as revenue rises 2%
content: Tesla reported a 7% decline in year-over-year revenue for the second quarter, contributing to a drop in profit.
summary: Tesla reported a 7% decline in year-over-year revenue for the second quarter, contributing to a drop in profit.

title: World logs hottest day since records began — with fresh highs expected in the coming months
content: The world's average temperature on Sunday climbed to its highest level ever recorded, according to the European Union's climate monitor.
summary: The world's average temperature on Sunday climbed to its highest level ever recorded, according to the European Union's climate monitor.

title: Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight loss drug wins UK approval for use as a heart treatment
content: The U.K.'s health regulator on Tuesday approved the use of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy drug to reduce the risk of obese adults suffering from serious heart problems or strokes.
summary: The U.K.'s health regulator on Tuesday approved the use of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy drug to reduce the risk of obese adults suffering from serious heart problems or strokes.

title: Modi's government pledges fiscal prudence in India's post-election budget
content: India's government promised spending on job creation but also called for fiscal prudence as it announced its financial budget on Tuesday.
summary: India's government promised spending on job creation but also called for fiscal prudence as it announced its financial budget on Tuesday.

title: Farnborough Air Show kicks off with $51 billion in deals as Airbus shows off new ultra long-haul jet
content: Airbus flew the A321XLR for the first time since it was certified, but its U.S. rival, Boeing. dominated on the deal-making front.
summary: Airbus flew the A321XLR for the first time since it was certified, but its U.S. rival, Boeing. dominated on the deal-making front.

title: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle resigns over Trump shooting outrage
content: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle was criticized for her agency's failure to prevent the attempted assassination of Donald Trump at a campaign rally.
summary: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle was criticized for her agency's failure to prevent the attempted assassination of Donald Trump at a campaign rally.

title: Hungary told it can't host EU gathering after the latest clash with Putin ally over Ukraine
content: Hungary has been stripped of the right to host the next high-profile gathering of EU foreign ministers, marking the latest clash between the bloc and Budapest.
summary: Hungary has been stripped of the right to host the next high-profile gathering of EU foreign ministers, marking the latest clash between the bloc and Budapest.

title: Scientists discover ‘dark oxygen’ being produced by seabed metals in ground-breaking study
content: A team of scientists has discovered that oxygen is being produced by metallic nodules thousands of meters below the surface of the Pacific Ocean.
summary: A team of scientists has discovered that oxygen is being produced by metallic nodules thousands of meters below the surface of the Pacific Ocean.

title: GM slows its EV plans again even as sales grow
content: GM is again slowing its plans for all-electric vehicles by further delaying a second electric U.S. truck plant and the Buick brand's first EV.
summary: GM is again slowing its plans for all-electric vehicles by further delaying a second electric U.S. truck plant and the Buick brand's first EV.

title: Ether ETFs officially begin trading in U.S., with funds from BlackRock, Grayscale and more
content: The new funds come about six months after the blockbuster debut for bitcoin ETFs.
summary: The new funds come about six months after the blockbuster debut for bitcoin ETFs.

title: Palestinian rivals Hamas and Fatah sign reconciliation agreement in China
content: This is far from the first time the rival groups have signed reconciliation pacts, only to return to hostilities due to persistent disagreements.
summary: This is far from the first time the rival groups have signed reconciliation pacts, only to return to hostilities due to persistent disagreements.

title: Andy Murray to retire as he says Paris Olympics his 'last ever tennis tournament'
content: Andy Murray will be calling it a day after joining Team GB in Paris following a stellar career that peaked with two famous victories in finals at Wimbledon.
summary: Andy Murray will be calling it a day after joining Team GB in Paris following a stellar career that peaked with two famous victories in finals at Wimbledon.

title: Comcast posts mixed results, weighed down by film studio, theme parks
content: Comcast reported second-quarter earnings that beat on earnings but missed on revenue due to tough comparisons for its film studio and theme parks.

title: European officials get excited about Kamala Harris — but are still hedging their bets
content: The U.S. election just '"got way more interesting," a senior EU diplomat told CNBC Monday.
summary: The U.S. election just '"got way more interesting," a senior EU diplomat told CNBC Monday.

title: Porsche shares fall 5% after automaker cuts 2024 outlook on aluminium alloy shortage
content: Shares in automaker Porsche fell on Tuesday after the company cut its 2024 outlook, citing a shortage of special aluminium alloys.
summary: Shares in automaker Porsche fell on Tuesday after the company cut its 2024 outlook, citing a shortage of special aluminium alloys.

title: Wiz walks away from $23 billion deal with Google, will pursue IPO
content: It would have been Google's largest-ever acquisition, but the company has chosen to pursue an IPO rather than an acquisition.
summary: It would have been Google's largest-ever acquisition, but the company has chosen to pursue an IPO rather than an acquisition.

title: Germany's struggling construction sector is showing no signs of a recovery
content: The German construction sector is showing no signs of recovering, even after being in a crisis for months and despite pledges of support from the government.
summary: The German construction sector is showing no signs of recovering, even after being in a crisis for months and despite pledges of support from the government.

title: Here's why China was largely unaffected by Friday's IT outage
content: While businesses in the U.S. and Europe woke up Friday to a global IT outage that disrupted airports and hotels, China went into its weekend largely unaffected.
summary: While businesses in the U.S. and Europe woke up Friday to a global IT outage that disrupted airports and hotels, China went into its weekend largely unaffected.

title: An Asian city is named the safest destination in the world for travelers
content: Singapore is named the world's safest city for tourists, according to recent research by Forbes Advisor.

title: China's CSI 300 leads declines in Asia amid mixed trading in the region; India markets fall after budget
content: India's Nifty 50 and the BSE Sensex were both down nearly 0.8% after the country unveiled its first budget under Prime Minister Narendra Modi's third five-year term.
